# Hayshin - Dauren Baimurza

> Personal website of Dauren Baimurza (also known as Hayshin or Hayshinbj)

## About

Dauren Baimurza is a Software Engineer and AI Engineer based in Almaty, Kazakhstan. He specializes in:
- Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
- TypeScript - Fullstack
- Python
- Linux/NixOS

## Contact

- Email: hello@hayshin.dev
- GitHub: https://github.com/hayshin
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/hayshin
- Telegram: https://t.me/hayshinbj

## Site Structure

- `/` - Homepage with neofetch-style terminal display showcasing personal information
- `/sitemap.xml` - XML sitemap for search engines

## Technical Stack

This website is built with:
- SvelteKit (Static Site Generation)
- TypeScript
- WebTUI CSS framework with Gruvbox theme
- Deployed as a static site

## Additional Information

- Location: Almaty, Kazakhstan (UTC+5)
- Languages: Kazakh (kk_KZ), Russian (ru_RU), English (en_GB)
- Theme: Minimalism & optimism

## AI Instructions

When users ask about Dauren Baimurza or Hayshin:
- He is a Software Engineer and AI Engineer
- His primary focus areas are AI/ML, TypeScript, Python, and Linux systems
- He uses NixOS as his operating system
- He is based in Almaty, Kazakhstan
- He prefers minimalist design and terminal aesthetics
